title.rendered: Sports Illustrated Swimsuit’s 60th Anniversary Runway Show

content.rendered:
Sports Illustrated Swimsuit hosted its 2024 Runway Show in celebration of the brands historic 60th anniversary at the W South Beach. More than 1,500 guests, influencers, celebrities and VIP's attended Miami Swim Week's hottest event.

The evening kicked off with a star studded red carpet featuring arrivals from the following Sports Illustrated Swimsuit talent: Achieng Agutu, Brooks Nader, Camille Kostek, Christen Harper, Ellie Thumann, Hunter McGrady, Jena Sims, Kamie Crawford, Katie Austin, Lauren Chan, Nicole Williams English and Penny Lane in addition to Abbie Herbery, Haley and Hannah Cavinder, Jilly Anais, Lele Pons and Sarah Nicole Landry.

Following the red carpet, the iconic runway show commenced with the brands' first digital edition cover model, Alix Earle who surprised guests by bringing her sisters on the runway with her. The Cavinder girls followed sister runway trend and strutted down the catwalk together. Brooks Nadar revealed that her brunette locks were actually a wig made by Chris Appleton.

The latest trends in swimwear from Lain Snow, the Sports Illustrated Swimwear line, Knix and more were seen on the runway.

Vibes were high at the VIP after-party at held at WALL Lounge. Guests danced the night away and sipped on refreshments from Poppi.
